title: 4br/2ba ►REMODELED, FULL-FLOOR, UPPER FLAT
posting_body: ['TO VIEW THIS HOME:', 'Please reply by email to this posting.', 'KEY DETAILS:', '•Bedrooms: 4 Bedrooms', '•Bathrooms: 2 Bathrooms', '•Property Type: Flat', '•Parking: 1-car independent garage parking', '•Pets Policy: Pets Welcome', '•Laundry: Washer and Dryer in unit', 'DESCRIPTION:', '•REMODELED, FULL-FLOOR FLAT, IN A THREE-UNIT, PRIVATE BUILDING!', '•Living room with working fireplace', '•Hardwood (pergo) floors throughout the home', '•Remodeled, eat-in, gas kitchen with granite counters, and all stainless appliances', '•Two large, remodeled, tiled baths; one bath in the master suite', '•Four bedrooms with generous closet spaces', '•In-unit washer and dryer', '•Newer exterior paint', '•Newer interior paint', '•Double pane windows and blinds', '•Recessed lighting throughout the home', '•Telephone jacks and cable hookup in every room', '•Optional 1-car secured indoor parking available for an extra fee', 'LOCATION:', "This renovated, full-floor, upper flat is situated in one of the city's most delightful neighborhoods, Bernal Heights.", 'At the border of the Inner Mission and Bernal Heights.', 'Mission Street and Cortland Avenue provide great coffeehouses, bars, restaurants, and shops, all within a short walk from your new home.', 'The Bart station is conveniently located within six blocks at Glen Park Station and 24th and Mission streets, and public transportation is everywhere.', 'A commuter dream: the financial district is approximately fifteen minutes away.', 'It is a five-minute drive to 280 or 101 freeways for a quick commute to the valley.', 'Street parking is easy, and there are many private and tech bus routes nearby.', 'LEASE TERMS:', '1.', 'Clean credit.', '2.', "First month's rent and a security deposit of one month's rent.", '3.', 'The lease is for one year.', '4.', 'The move-in date is anytime in August or September 1st.', 'Thank you for reading this posting.', 'If you would like to attend our open home or schedule a private viewing, please reply by email to this posting.']
